code: import headers from'./headers';import{formatBodyUrlEncoded}from'../../utils/format';import{clientID,clientSecret,autenticationUrl,urlAPI}from'../../constants/api-constants';const api={autentication:{getToken(){var details={'grant_type':'client_credentials','client_id':clientID,'client_secret':clientSecret};const url="".concat(autenticationUrl,"/api/token");headers.post_urlencoded.body=formatBodyUrlEncoded(details);return fetch(url,headers.post_urlencoded);}},tracks:{newReleases(token){const url="".concat(urlAPI,"/browse/new-releases");headers.get.headers.authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);return fetch(url,headers.get);}},albums:{getAlbums(token,ids){const url="".concat(urlAPI,"/albums?ids=").concat(ids);headers.get.headers.authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);return fetch(url,headers.get);}},artis:{getArtistByName(token,name){const url="".concat(urlAPI,"/search?q=").concat(name.replaceAll(' ','+'),"&type=artist");headers.get.headers.authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);return fetch(url,headers.get);}}};export default api;
